entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 11 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
